item.title: By: hitesh
item.dc:creator: hitesh
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I have one small doubt in SSRS.See its like i want the end user to select the columns and tables of his choice from front end and accordingly i will pass that parameters to ssrs as data source.But while doing this im getting error like there are no columns.
My Procedure is something like this
create proc pr_fetchData
@fields nvarchar(700),
@tables nvarchar(500)
as
begin
‘select’+ @fields + ‘from’ +@tables
end
and i pass the parameter from application to ssrs. Please help me how to get the above process completed.
